name: Cyber33: Before the Dawn
description:
Cyber 33 : Before the Dawn is a minimalist Tower Defense game in a cyber futiristic universe.

(As it was made for the LudumDare 46 in 72h, it may be unbalanced and a little bit short !)

For mac users : Try the "build2" if the first did not work. (this build was made by someone else on a mac and should work)
